item.title: 斯凯登因业务下滑关闭上海办公室
item.description: Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom LLP 将关闭其上海办事处，并在中国大陆裁员，原因是中国经济衰退导致交易放缓，影响了该律师事务所的业务。【原文：Skadden, Arps, Slate, Meagher & Flom LLP is shuttering its Shanghai office and laid off some staff in the mainland after the law firm’s business was dented by a slowdown in deals amid China’s economic slump.】

item.title: 据说 Cerberus 和 Intrum 接近达成购买 20 亿欧元 Hoist 贷款的协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Cerberus Capital Management LP 和 Intrum AB 即将达成一项协议，从 Hoist Finance AB 收购面值约 20 亿欧元（22 亿美元）的西班牙不良贷款。【原文：Cerberus Capital Management LP and Intrum AB are nearing a deal to buy Spanish bad loans with a face value of around €2 billion ($2.2 billion) from Hoist Finance AB, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Verizon 将从 US Cellular 购买 10 亿美元频谱资产
item.description: 美国最大的无线运营商威瑞森通信公司（Verizon Communications Inc.【原文：Verizon Communications Inc., the biggest wireless carrier in the US, will buy some of US Cellular Corp.’s spectrum licenses for $1 billion as the tower operator sheds parts of its portfolio.】

item.title: 潘帕公司评估阿根廷液化天然气项目，米莱公司助力页岩增长
item.description: 阿根廷能源生产商潘帕能源公司（Pampa Energia SA）将在未来三个月内决定是否合作建设一座价值数十亿美元的液化天然气工厂，因为哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）总统放松经济管制的努力加速了世界第二大页岩气矿床的开发。【原文：Argentina energy producer Pampa Energia SA will decide in the next three months whether to partner on a multibillion-dollar LNG plant as President Javier Milei’s crusade to deregulate the economy accelerates development of the world’s second-biggest shale gas deposit.】

item.title: 随着风暴 "阿什利 "的逼近，英国风力发电量有望创下历史新高
item.description: 由于风暴 "阿什利 "从大西洋席卷而来，英国风力发电量将在本周末创下新纪录。【原文：UK wind power output is set to hit a fresh record this weekend as Storm Ashley is sweeping in from the Atlantic Ocean.】

item.title: 马来西亚 2025 年支出计划的赢家和输家
item.description: 马来西亚零售商和旅游相关企业将从明年的国家支出计划中获益，因为政府将增加现金派发和奖励措施，以减轻取消部分补贴所带来的影响。【原文：Malaysia’s retailers and tourism-related firms are poised to benefit from the national spending plan for next year as the government increases cash handouts and incentives to mitigate the impact of some subsidy removals.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Farrer 募集 5 亿美元用于农业贸易
item.description: 大宗商品对冲基金 Farrer Capital Management Pty 在筹集了 5 亿美元资金后，已停止接受新的投资，成为市场上仅有的专业农业投资者之一。【原文：Commodity hedge fund Farrer Capital Management Pty has closed to new investment after raising $500 million, making it one of the only specialist agriculture investors in the market.】

item.title: 扎布卡股票在华沙交易第二天跌破首次公开募股价格
item.description: 波兰连锁便利店 Zabka Group SA 的股价在上市交易的第二天就跌破了首次公开募股的价格，这对欧洲今年第四大上市企业造成了打击。【原文：Polish convenience store chain Zabka Group SA saw its shares slump below their initial public offering price on their second day of trading, in a blow to Europe’s fourth-biggest listing this year.】

item.title: 欧洲退缩，全球健康资助者转向海湾国家
item.description: 阿拉伯海湾国家越来越多地被要求提供医疗保健资金，因为人们越来越担心传统的欧洲捐助者是否有能力继续满足捐款需求。【原文：Arab Gulf states are increasingly being asked for health-care funding as concern grows over the ability of traditional European donors to continue meeting contribution needs.】

item.title: 新兴市场货币因中国支持而走强
item.description: 周五，新兴市场货币受到中国央行支持市场举措的提振而走高，而此前的数据显示中国经济扩张速度为六个季度以来最低。【原文：Emerging-market currencies advanced Friday, buoyed by a move by China’s central bank to support markets, just as data showed the economy expanding the least in six quarters.】

item.title: 人工智能驱动的能源热潮的现实检验
item.description:
国际能源署表示，计算中心将导致电力需求飙升并非必然。【原文：

It’s not a given that computing centers will cause electricity needs to soar, the IEA says.

】

item.title: SLB 警告谨慎的石油勘探者已放缓支出增长速度
item.description: 全球最大的油田服务供应商 SLB 公司警告说，在过去几个月里，由于大宗商品价格下跌，客户采取谨慎态度，石油勘探公司的支出增长有所减弱。【原文：SLB, the world’s biggest oilfield services provider, warned that spending growth by oil explorers has waned in the past few months as customers take a cautious approach amid lower commodity prices.】

item.title: 电动汽车需求降温，CATL 季度收入大幅减少
item.description: 当代 Amperex Technology Co.由于全球电动汽车销售开始放缓，该公司公布的季度净利润远低于分析师的预期。【原文：Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. reported quarterly net income well short of analyst estimates as the global slowdown in electric vehicle sales starts to bite.】

item.title: 亚马逊向商家推销人工智能广告
item.description: 亚马逊正在向其商家宣传人工智能在广告中的最新应用。但首先...【原文：Amazon is pitching its merchants on the latest uses of AI for advertising. But first...】

item.title: 为什么我们一直在阅读关于埃隆-马斯克的文章？
item.description:
今年的三本新书研究了他在 2022 年购买 Twitter 的情况。【原文：

Three new books this year examine his 2022 purchase of Twitter.

】

item.title: 肯尼亚立法者批准总统对新副总统的提名
item.description: 肯尼亚总统威廉-鲁托（William Ruto）提名内政部长基图雷-金迪基（Kithure Kindiki）为其副手的提名获得国民议会批准，巩固了他对权力的控制。【原文：Kenyan President William Ruto’s nomination of Interior Secretary Kithure Kindiki as his deputy was approved by the National Assembly, consolidating his grip on power.】

item.title: 道达尔计划在 2025 年大幅停产欧洲最大炼油厂
item.description: 据三位知情人士透露，道达尔能源 SE 正计划在 2025 年下半年对其欧洲最大的炼油厂进行重大改造。【原文：TotalEnergies SE is planning a major turnaround at its biggest European refinery in the second half of 2025, according to three people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 讲述 2024 年股市反弹的简单故事
item.description: 投资者喜欢故事，而政治则是辛辣的情节线。本周，对冲基金经理斯坦-德鲁肯米勒（Stan Druckenmiller）对彭博社电视台表示，近期市场的疯狂波动在很大程度上反映了对特朗普赢得总统选举的定价。【原文：Investors love a story, and politics makes for spicy plot lines. Just ask hedge fund manager Stan Druckenmiller, who made waves this week by telling Bloomberg Television that much of the frantic motion in markets of late reflects the pricing in of a Trump presidential victory.】

item.title: 特斯拉 "全自动驾驶 "在美国遭遇致命缺陷调查
item.description: 特斯拉公司被称为 "全自动驾驶 "的部分自动化系统是否存在缺陷，美国联邦政府在发生四起车祸（其中一起造成人员死亡）后展开了调查。【原文：The US opened a federal investigation into whether Tesla Inc.’s partial-automation system known as Full Self-Driving is defective after four crashes, one of which resulted in a fatality.】

item.title: 印尼控制镍矿供应以平衡疲软需求
item.description: 印尼政府一位部长表示，印尼正在管理其矿工生产的镍矿石数量，以平衡供需。【原文：Indonesia is managing the amount of nickel ore its miners produce in order to balance supply and demand, a government minister said.】

item.title: 维诺德-科斯拉（Vinod Khosla）称未来五年内 "融合将成为现实
item.description:
这位亿万富翁投资人认为，这项技术是为人工智能推动的数据中心繁荣脱碳的一种方式。【原文：

The billionaire investor sees the technology as a way to decarbonize the AI-fueled data center boom.

】

item.title: 四天工作周试点在试验中说服了大多数德国企业
item.description: 德国的一个每周工作四天的试点项目发现，近四分之三的参与者没有恢复到每周工作五天的标准。【原文：A pilot project of the four-day work week in Germany found that almost three quarters of participants aren’t returning to a five-day standard.】

item.title: 印度雄心勃勃推动经济发展，融资热潮成为焦点：印度信贷论坛
item.description: 孟买火车站附近的乘客。【原文：Commuters near the train station in Mumbai.】

item.title: 香港承诺将 IPO 审核缩减至约 100 天
item.description: 香港承诺在约 100 天内完成对公司的审核和首次公开募股，以保证首次公开募股申请者在规定时间内完成申请。【原文：Hong Kong pledged to vet and debut companies in about 100 days in a bid to guarantee a set time frame for initial public offering applicants.】

item.title: 俄罗斯与迪拜新公司合作增加液化天然气影子船队油轮
item.description: 迪拜一家新成立的公司接管了三艘液化天然气油轮，这似乎是俄罗斯规避西方制裁的最新努力。【原文：A newly established company in Dubai has taken over three liquefied natural gas tankers, in what appears to be Russia’s latest effort to circumvent Western sanctions.】

item.title: 机器人汽车的失败让特斯拉的高股价看起来摇摇欲坠
item.description: 上周，特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.投资者的失望也让市场质疑特斯拉股票的溢价估值。【原文：Tesla Inc.’s reveal of its much-hyped self-driving car last week left investors underwhelmed and sent shares plunging. The disappointment also left the Street questioning the shares’ premium valuation.】

item.title: 据说中东顶级杂货商 LuLu 将在下周评估 IPO 胃口
item.description: 路路通集团国际公司（LuLu Group International）经营着中东最大的连锁大卖场之一，该公司计划下周开始评估投资者的兴趣，为今年该地区最大的首次公开募股做准备。【原文：LuLu Group International, which operates one of the Middle East’s largest hypermarket chains, plans to start gauging investor interest next week in preparation for what could be among the year’s biggest initial public offerings in the region.】

item.title: 前 Freepoint 顶级天然气交易员计划成立自己的对冲基金
item.description: 弗雷迪-西泽（Freddie Sizer）是 Freepoint Commodities LLC 欧洲天然气实物交易的前负责人，他已开始为一家新的对冲基金筹集资金，该基金将寻求从该地区能源市场日益加剧的价格波动中获利。【原文：Freddie Sizer, a former head of European physical gas trading at Freepoint Commodities LLC, has started to raise money for a new hedge fund that will seek to profit from increasing price swings in the region’s energy markets.】

item.title: 欧洲惨淡财报显示股民为何更青睐美国
item.description: 欧洲最大的公司接连发布盈利预警，与美国财报季的乐观开局形成鲜明对比。【原文：A flurry of profit warnings issued by Europe’s biggest companies — in sharp contrast with an upbeat start to the US earnings season — show why the region’s equity markets will likely continue to trail Wall Street.】

item.title: LinkedIn 上令人尴尬的帖子在快速增长的 Subreddit 上被大量转载
item.description:
在 LinkedIn Lunatics 上，67 万名会员哀叹微软旗下专业社交网站上 "令人难以忍受 "的内容越来越多。【原文：

On LinkedIn Lunatics, 670,000 members lament the rise of ‘insufferable’ content on the Microsoft-owned professional networking site.

】
